what: The package is used to identify anomalous clinical time series
title: The package is used to identify anomalous clinical time series
text: Pekka Tiikkainen, Bayer Pharmaceuticals

title: The package is used to identify anomalous clinical time series
text: CTAS R package identifying outliers anomalies clinical trial time series. main focus flagging sites one study parameters whose profiles differ sites. However, also anomalies individual subjects can identified results package gives. document focuses data format requirements input output data. details methodology, please refer paper presentation published PHUSE EU Connect 22 meeting. files attached repository.

title: The package is used to identify anomalous clinical time series
text: First clinical data wrangled format compatible main function’s parameters (please see definitions). Please note data preparation step intentionally --scope package user likely data different format. main function (process_a_study) called separately study wish process. function returns results list data frames. details output, please see .

title: The package is used to identify anomalous clinical time series
text: Minimum number time points auto-generated time series. value used parameter time_point_count_min column defined parameters df.

title: The package is used to identify anomalous clinical time series
text: Minimum number eligible subjects auto-generated time series. value used parameter subject_count_min column defined parameters df. parameter minimum value two.

title: The package is used to identify anomalous clinical time series
text: Maximum share missing time points subject can order eligible time series. value used parameter max_share_missing defined parameters df.

title: The package is used to identify anomalous clinical time series
text: TRUE, change--baseline adjusted version time series generated (addition time series actual measurements).

title: The package is used to identify anomalous clinical time series
text: TRUE, time series autogenerated data-driven matter parameters. set FALSE, custom_timeseries data frame must least one entry.

title: The package is used to identify anomalous clinical time series
text: Data frame one row per study subject. Data frame columns:

title: The package is used to identify anomalous clinical time series
text: Data frame one row parameter processed. Parameters , example, laboratory assays vital sign measurements done course study. Data frame columns: Example two parameters, one vital sign one local lab. time series generated vital sign, least 50 eligible subjects required. local lab, time series one time point acceptable. parameter-specific properties override corresponding global parameters (see ).

title: The package is used to identify anomalous clinical time series
text: Data frame data collected study one row per data point. Data frame columns: Example data contents:

title: The package is used to identify anomalous clinical time series
text: study team might interested specific time series - instance oncology trial one might interested data collected first two treatment cycles. time series auto-generated data-driven manner, guaranteed particular time series generated. make sure specific time series analyzed, can defined custom_timeseries data frame. Please note: custom time series process, still provide main function blank data frame! Data frame columns: example , custom time series defined dummy_param_1. Timepoints defined respective ranks data df.

code: check_input_data(   subjects,   parameters,   data,   custom_timeseries,   custom_reference_groups,   default_timeseries_features_to_calculate,   default_minimum_timepoints_per_series,   default_minimum_subjects_per_series,   default_max_share_missing_timepoints_per_series,   default_generate_change_from_baseline,   autogenerate_timeseries )

title: check_input_data — check_input_data
text: subjects Data frame one row per study subject. parameters Data frame one row per study parameter (e.g. labs vital signs) process. data Measurements study parameters. One row per data point. custom_timeseries Pre-defined time series. custom_reference_groups Parameter-feature combinations sites compared within country region - globally. default_timeseries_features_to_calculate Semicolon-delimited string time series features calculate. default_minimum_timepoints_per_series Default minimum timepoints per time series. used parameter-specific minimum defined parameters. default_minimum_subjects_per_series Default minimum subjects per time series. used parameter-specific minimum defined parameters. default_max_share_missing_timepoints_per_series Maximum share time points can missing per subject. used parameter-specific minimum defined parameters. default_generate_change_from_baseline set TRUE, time series features calculate also change--baseline values. autogenerate_timeseries set TRUE, automatic definition time series used. set FALSE, custom_timeseries must least one time series defined.

title: Get timpepoint that has the most sites and patients — get_max_sites_and_subjects
text: called pick_timepoint combos. uses loop iterate possible timeseries returns eligable patients sites. returns highest timepoint rank highest number sites highest number patients. NA values can occur randomly patient elegibility can vary depending timepoint range. necessarily shortest range patients. iteratively need determine optimal conditions using loop.

title: process_a_study — process_a_study
text: Main function calculating time series features study parameters, flagging study sites systematic bias.

title: process_a_study — process_a_study
code: process_a_study(   subjects,   parameters,   data,   custom_timeseries,   custom_reference_groups,   default_timeseries_features_to_calculate,   default_minimum_timepoints_per_series,   default_minimum_subjects_per_series,   default_max_share_missing_timepoints_per_series,   default_generate_change_from_baseline,   autogenerate_timeseries,   optimize_sites_and_patients = FALSE )

title: process_a_study — process_a_study
text: subjects Data frame one row per study subject. parameters Data frame one row per study parameter (e.g. labs vital signs) process. data Measurements study parameters. One row per data point. custom_timeseries Pre-defined time series. custom_reference_groups Parameter-feature combinations sites compared within country region - globally. default_timeseries_features_to_calculate Semicolon-delimited string time series features calculate. default_minimum_timepoints_per_series Default minimum timepoints per time series. used parameter-specific minimum defined parameters. default_minimum_subjects_per_series Default minimum subjects per time series. used parameter-specific minimum defined parameters. default_max_share_missing_timepoints_per_series Maximum share time points can missing per subject. used parameter-specific minimum defined parameters. default_generate_change_from_baseline set TRUE, time series features calculate also change--baseline values. autogenerate_timeseries set TRUE, automatic definition time series used. set FALSE, custom_timeseries must least one time series defined. optimize_sites_and_patients set TRUE, always creates timeseries many sites patients possible respecting function parameters. Default:FALSE

title: process_a_study — process_a_study
text: List four data frames. Timeseries: definition time series used. Timeseries_features: features calculated time series. PCA_coordinates: principal components individual time series visualizing similarity. Site_scores: biasness scores sites.

title: process_a_study — process_a_study
text: Pekka Tiikkainen, pekka.tiikkainen@bayer.com
